analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sa nidassana ttika magga ārammaṇa ttika

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ namaggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na magga ārammaṇam dhammam paccayā anidassana appaṭighaḥ magga ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ namaggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa ppaṭigham na magga hetukam dhammam paccayā anidassana appaṭighaḥ magga hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ namaggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na magga adhipatim dhammam paccayā anidassana appaṭighaḥ magga adhipati dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
